summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block three (3), Hazeltine Heights Addition, and in Block seven (7) of Ayer & Walker's Addition; being the alley beetween 36th Avenue and 37th Avenue, extending from East James Street to East Cherry Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6339 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
